law.text: The Attorney General of Maryland or the State's Attorney of any county of the State that borders on a portion of the Chesapeake Bay or on a tidewater portion of any of the Chesapeake Bay's tributaries may enforce this subtitle and may seek criminal penalties against any person who violates or is alleged to be violating § 5-1102 of this subtitle anywhere in the area of the Chesapeake Bay and the tidewater portions of the Chesapeake Bay's tributaries.
